kizuna_language_d_02: Pawmi here is as healthy as can be![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_03:
Hahaha! Well, it seems being quiet is simply a
part of this one’s personality![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_04:
But it’s hard for a Pokémon to communicate with
its fellows without speaking up.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_05:
As you know, wild Pokémon use their cries to tell
each other all sorts of things—like the location of\r
food or whether there are predators nearby.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_06:
So even if I were to release it back into the wild,
I’m afraid that it may not be able to do those\r
sorts of things![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]What do you think, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?
Where\r
does\r
Pawmi belong?[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_08b: Oh?! I didn’t expect to hear mon nom—my name![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_09: So you think it should stay here...with me![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_10:
I was so focused on getting it back in good
health so it could return to the wild that I didn’t\r
even consider that possibility![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_11:
What do you think about that idea, my little
Pawmi friend?[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_13:
Even without speaking Pokémon language myself,
I know that that reply means “yes”![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_14:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh, my dear [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Merci
so\r
very,\r
very\r
much\r
for\r
all\r
your\r
help\r
with Pawmi![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_16:
All the more reason you should have this—here,
a rare Pokémon for you to raise![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_system_02: You received a Meowth from Mr. Salvatore!
kizuna_language_d_15:
Ahhh, I’m so happy! Yes—I, Salvatore, will take
it upon myself to look after Pawmi for good!\r
I will indeed![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_d_system_01: You formed a close bond with Mr. Salvatore!
